学園には所属しない犯罪者パイロットの集団――\n通称『双頭の斧』ですわ。:
A group of criminal pilots who didn't belong to the academy—
It's commonly known as the 'Two-Headed Axe.'
彼女達は学園には所属せず、メイズ内で違法採掘を行ったり、\n探索中の他のパイロッ:
The girls didn't belong to the academy, and they did illegal mining within the Mays
They're outlaws who raid and pillage other pilots while they're exploring.
たまに学園に少数が襲撃してくることもある。\n風紀委員がその取締りをやってるみた:
Occasionally, a small number of people would attack the school.
The disciplinary committee seems to be cracking down on that.
リーダーは専用機を使用しているって話だけど……あれかな？: I've heard that the leader is using his personal TSF... Is that it?
確かに指揮官機と見られる機体のカラーリングは、\n他のＭＧとは異なって見える。専:
It was true that the coloring of the aircraft, which could be seen as commander planes, was...
It looks different from the other MGs. There's no doubt it's a personal TSF.
どこかの企業か大きい組織が、\nスポンサーをしているって噂を聞いたことがあります:
Some company or big organization
I've heard rumors that you're a sponsor.
まあ、あんなのを違法組織が自前で持てるわけないだろうしな……: Well, there's no way an illegal organization could have something like that on their own...
とにかく実弾を使ってるやつとまともにやりあってられるか。\nすぐに生徒会へ報告す:
Anyway, I guess I'll be able to fight someone who's using live ammo.
Report back to the student council immediately!
だ、だめです。通信が妨害されています！: I-I can't. The comms are jammed!
通信妨害をしてくる以上、無計画な襲撃ではなさそうだ。: Since they were interfering with our communications, it didn't seem like an unplanned attack.
今は事態を察知した生徒会が救援部隊を向けてくれるのを\n期待するしかないか。:
Right now, he was watching the student council, which had sensed the situation, send a rescue team
Guess I'll just have to hope.
私は『双頭の斧』のリーダー――: I am the leader of the Two-Headed Axe—
龍宮ちゆるに告ぐ。ただちに投降しなさい。\n我々に従えば仲間達を傷つけることはし:
Attention, Ryuugu. Surrender immediately.
If you follow us, you won't hurt your friends.
龍宮ちゆる……あいつらの狙いも、ちゆるなのか！？: Ryuugu Chiyuru... Are they trying to kill us too!?
双頭の斧下っ端達の機体が、最初の砲撃で大破したジュリー機を囲み、\n砲口を向けて:
The two-headed axe-underlings' fuselage surrounded the Julie machine, which had been heavily damaged by the first bombardment
It's pointing its cannon at the cockpit.
あたしは大丈夫よ……！ 怪我もないわ！\nこんなやつらの言う事なんか、聞かないで:
I'll be fine...! I'm not hurt!
Don't listen to these guys!
人質とっておいて何が賢明だよ！: What's smart about taking a hostage?!
ちゆるさんは渡せませんし、\nジュリーさんも助けないといけませんし……:
I can't give Chiyuru-san to you,
We need to save Julie, too...
……こうなると、こっちが取れる手は少ない。: ...Now that it's come to this, there's not much I can do.
白奈の言う通りだった。\n今はできる限り時間を稼いで状況が動くのを待つしかないか:
Shirona was right.
Right now, all we can do is buy as much time as we can and wait for the situation to move.
あたしはここよ！ 仲間に手を出さないで！: I'm right here! Don't lay a finger on my friends!
どう対応すべきかと考えているうちに\n遮蔽物に隠れていたちゆる機が姿を晒していた:
While I was thinking about how to deal with it
The Chiyurugi, which had been hiding behind cover, had exposed itself.
指揮官機に促された双頭の斧の下っ端機が、\nゆっくりちゆる機に近づいていく。:
At the command plane's urging, the two-headed axe's underling
I slowly approach the machine.
でも！ このままだとちゆるさんが……: But! At this rate, Chiyuru-san will...
敵の戦力評価、自分達の状況。\n頭をフル稼働させて何か手がないか考える。:
The enemy's assessment of their strength, their situation.
I put my head into full operation and thought about what I could do.
考えろ……考えるんだ。必ず何か手はあるはずだっ。: Think... Think. There must be a way.
双頭の斧は一撃でジュリー機を行動不能にしたように\n実弾を装備している。:
The two-headed axe seemed to incapacitate the Julie machine with a single blow
She's equipped with live ammunition.
だがこちらはあくまで競技用の模擬弾しかない。\n真正面から戦いを挑むのは無謀を通:
However, this one only had mock bullets for competition.
Challenging a fight head-on would be beyond reckless and suicidal.
たああぁぁぁぁぁ！！ 足手まといなんてごめんよ！！: Taaaaahhhh!! I don't want to be a burden!!
行動不能だと思われたジュリー機が跳躍ユニットを全力噴射させ、\n上空に向けて跳躍:
The Julie machine, which seemed incapacitated, sent the leaping unit flying at full power
I leap into the air.
だが姿勢が保てていない。\n大破の影響で、まともに動かせない状態なのは明らかだ。:
But I can't maintain my posture.
It's clear that she's in a state where she can't move properly due to the massive damage.
くっ、いうこときけぇ！ このこのこのぉ～！: Ugh, listen to what I'm saying! You, you, you!
必死に機体をコントロールしようとしているが、\nあれでは墜落しているのと変わらな:
She was desperately trying to control the aircraft, but...
That's no different from a crash.
この場にいる全員の目が不規則なジュリー機の動きを追う。: The eyes of everyone present followed the irregular movements of the Julie machine.
体当たりを敢行するが機体は明後日の方向へ飛んでいく。: I try to slam into it, but the glider flies in the direction of the day after tomorrow.
ジュリーの機体は少し離れたビルへ頭から突っ込んでいた。: Julie's aircraft had plunged headfirst into a building a short distance away.
手近にいた敵機に体当たりで襲い掛かり尻もちをつかせる。: He slammed into a nearby enemy machine with a body slam, knocking it flat on its butt.
ジュリーはどうするの！？: What are you going to do, Julie?!
%usernameusernameuserna%さんをここに置いていけません！\:
I can't leave %usernameusernameuserna% here!
I'll stay here, too!
敵の作戦目標はちゆるだ！ やつらもそっちに戦力を割くはず！\nこっちに戦力を残す:
The enemy's objective is to attack! They should be able to focus their forces on that!
There's no need to send them here to leave a force behind! Think of your priorities!
霞光でもそれなりのことはできる！ 行け！: Even in the haze, I can do that! Go!
……！ シリウスシュガー、撤退しますわよ！\n他のプレ・クラス－Ａの皆も続いてく:
...! Sirius Sugaru, we're retreating!
Everyone else in Pre-Class-A, please follow me!
七彩を先頭に各機が撤退していく。: Each of the machines withdrew, with Shichika leading the way.
目標の確保を優先よ、追いなさい！\n一応、数機は残り、墜落した機体も押さえておけ:
Securing the target takes priority. Follow him!
Just in case, there are still a few left, and hold down the aircraft that crashed.
指揮官機の指示に跳躍しようとしていた下っ端機に背後から迫る。: He closed in on the underlings, who were about to leap at the commander's orders, from behind.
ジュリーのもとに行かせるかよ！: I won't let you go to Julie!
霞光は武装していないが、まったく戦えないわけではない。\n整備員には怒られるが、:
Kasumi Hikaru was unarmed, but it wasn't like she couldn't fight at all
The maintenance crew would get mad at me, but there was the option of a "meatball fight."
跳躍ユニットの噴射口を殴られた双頭の斧下っ端機は、\n姿勢を制御できずに失速して:
The two-headed axe underling had been hit by the spout of the jump unit
Unable to control my posture, I stalled and licked the ground.
演習用の武装すらない機体で、\n我々を足止めするつもりか……！？:
It wasn't even armed for field exercises.
Are you trying to slow us down?!
足止めだと？ 舐めるな。: Hold me back? Don't underestimate me.
包囲するように双頭の斧の下っ端機達が距離を詰める。: The two-headed axe underlings closed the distance as if to surround them.
下手に背中を見せて俺に攻撃のチャンスを与えるより、\nここで確実に潰しておくつも:
Rather than carelessly showing my back and giving me a chance to attack,
She must be planning to crush them here and now.
俺は足止めなど考えていない。\nお前らを全機撃墜してやることだけを考えている。:
I wasn't trying to slow her down.
I'm only thinking about shooting down all of you.
啖呵を切りながらも口の端が歪むのを止められない。\nこいつらを相手にどこまで時間:
I can't stop the corners of my mouth from curling up, even though I'm talking loudly.
I don't know how much time I can buy against these guys...
おー！ かっこいい～！ 男のコって感じですね！: Wow! You're so cool! You look like a guy!
学園生徒に手を出したこと、後悔させてあげます！: I'll make you regret laying a hand on the students!
撤退したと思っていたフルート機とドロテア機が、\n跳躍ユニットをふかして引き返し:
The flute and Dorothea machines, which I had thought had withdrawn,
I saw her turn back, puffing up her jumping unit.
